verses.roman:
mahāprabhu cali' cali' āilā vārāṇasī
candraśekhara mililā grāmera bāhire āsi'

synonyms: mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; cali' cali'-walking and walking; āilā—arrived; vārāṇasī—at Vārāṇasī; candraśekhara—Candraśekhara; mililā—He met; grāmera—of the village; bāhire—outside; āsi'-coming.
translation: After walking and walking, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu finally arrived at Vārāṇasī, where He met Candraśekhara, who was coming out of the city.
